pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Gavv (2024, TV show)$(br2)Used by $(l:gavv/riders/bake)Kamen Rider Bake$(/l)$(br2)Used to obtain Bake's $(l:gavv/devices/bakebuckle)Bakebuckle$(/l)$(br2)Can free villagers from $(l:gavv/items/heatpress)Hitpresses$(/l) when held in your off-hand
